name: Modern Farmer
overview: In search of inspiration, rock band “Excellent Souls” — Lee Min Ki, Kang Hyeok, Yoo Han Cheol — goes on hiatus deep in the countryside. To their surprise, the village elder is none other than Kang Yoon Hee, a zippy woman who's not only the town’s first female leader, but also the youngest. She also just so happens to be bandleader Min Ki’s first love. Amidst a rural backdrop, these scrappy rockers take stock of what stirs their passions — both musical and romantic.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: As the leader of the washed-out band of yesteryear Excellent Souls, Min Ki is strapped for cash. Upon his grandmother's passing, he realizes that his inheritance of land might be a prime area to grow cabbages.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Min Ki and his buddies discover that farming cabbages is harder than they anticipated. Together, they cause numerous disturbances in the tiny village, where Min Ki runs into his first love.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Min Ki and his friends meet two mysterious girls in the village, then discover that farming is more expensive than they thought. Yoon Hee must win the upcoming Village Olympics in order to remain as village foreman.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After accidentally setting their house on fire after a drunken night, Min Ki and his friends are forced to stay with Yoon Hee. The town's pride is on the line with the upcoming Village Olympics, and Min Ki and his friends help to train the townspeople.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Hadoorokri prepares to go against their rivals in the Village Olympics. Min Ki and his friends learn that they need the village's farming god's help to plant their cabbage seeds.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Min ki teaches Min Ho how to deal with a bully. In order for Min Ki and his buddies to use the greenhouse, they must help Sang Deuk prepare for his blind date.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Min Ki runs into his former crush Yoo Na unexpectedly, causing him to deal with his lingering feelings. The cabbage seeds begin to sprout and get moved over to the field for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The entire village works together to find the culprit responsible for stealing the crops. Soo Yeon finally agrees to go on a date with Han Chul.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Min Ki's lingering feelings towards Yoo Na has Yoon Hee feeling jealous, despite having a suitor of her own. Soo Yeon tries to turn away Han Chul's feelings and heads up to Seoul.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The Hadoorokri townsfolk participate in a relay protest against rising rice prices. Both Min Ho and Min Gook are embarrassed about their upcoming Bring Your Father to School Day.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The neighborhood kids worry about Bring Your Father To School Day at school. Yoon Hee and Hyuk inadvertently spend the night together and In Ki's past come to light.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The villagers head up to Seoul with their crops to sell at the street market. Yoon Hee has to stay at home with an injury with an unlikely guest who takes care of her.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The village prepares for a national sing-off show in order to promote their apples. Min Ki and his friends discover that the little snails in their cabbage patch are pests, not adorable.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: It's Ki Joon's birthday, which brings a surprise visit to the neighborhood. The village continues to prepare for the sing-off auditions and Min Ki starts to see Yoon Hee again in a new light.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A meteor falls in Hadooroki and crowds of eager treasure hunters flock the village. Min Ki and his friends have trouble selling their cabbage and try to find new opportunities to make their album.
